name: GNC Mega Men Sport Multivitamin
description:
GNC Mega Men Sport Multivitamin

Key features

  • Each serving of GNC Mega Men Sport Multivitamin provides 43 superior and premium quality essential nutrients to help achieve your daily nutritional goals that everyday diet may not provide.
  • Supports heart health, prostate health, keeps eyes healthy, is great for overall health and well-being.
  • GNC Mega Men Sports is enriched with the goodness of antioxidants to prevent your body from free radicals generated during your intense workout.Antioxidants also help to slow down aging process.
  • It has components like L- glutamine, L- arginine, and taurine those help in enhancing exercise performance by reducing fatigue and decreasing muscle soreness.
  • GNC Mega Men Sport includes branched chain amino acids to help fuel muscles. It also supports muscles by providing the right electrolytes that may be lost during intensive exercise sessions, including calcium that plays a pivotal role in mediating muscle contraction.

Product Description

GNC Mega Men Sport provides a solid blend of essential nutrients and powerful ingredients to support men’s overall health, performance, and muscle function. One should know that not all multivitamins are the same. This one is especially designed by nutritional experts keeping in mind fitness enthusiasts. Along with super antioxidant blend, sports blend is being added in GNC Mega Men Sports Blend which includes L-Arginine, L-Taurine, L-Glutamine, Choline, Inositol, Boron and Hyaluronic Acid. These ingredients work together to improve to further fuel your muscle performance.Get the best quality multivitamins for men with GNC Mega Men Sport Multivitamin. It has more antioxidant power and is available in easy to swallow and digest tablets.

Benefits of GNC Mega Men Sport Multivitamin

Provides extra pump to fuel muscles

  • If you’re looking for that extra something to fuel your muscles, then this is the best multivitamin. BCAA present in the formulation will help fuel your muscles to work harder without affecting them. The super ingredients present will also help reduce muscle soreness and fatigue.It also supports muscles by providing the right electrolytes that may be lost during intensive exercise sessions, including calcium that plays a pivotal role in mediating muscle contraction.

Enriched with antioxidants

It is packed with the goodness of antioxidants to protect the cells against oxidative damage caused by free radicals during intense workout.

Has a host of water soluble vitamins

Vitamins A, D, E, and K are excess fat soluble vitamins that are stored in the body. On the other hand, water soluble vitamins like Vitamin C and B are not stored and need to be taken regularly. These vitamins travel through the body and taking a multivitamin with water-soluble vitamins will have beneficial effects on your overall health.

Beneficial for prostate support

It has lycopene to support normal prostate functioning and keeping it healthy.

Good for eye health

Vitamins A, Lutein, and Zeaxanthin are some of the micronutrients that are great for eye health and all these are present in GNC Mega Men Sport Multivitamin. As per a recent study it was suggested that multivitamin enriched with the amalgamation of zeaxanthin, lutein and vitamins may lower the risk of macular degeneration.

Decreases anxiety and stress

GNC Mega Men Sports has a vitamin B complex. And it is proven that the Vitamin B family is responsible for boosting your mood, lowers anxiety and stress levels, alleviates tension, and increases overall energy levels.

name: GNC Pro Performance Zinc Magnesium Amino (ZMA)
description:
GNC Pro Performance Zinc Magnesium Amino (ZMA) Complex

Product Description

Adequate sleep plays a large role in health. Not getting enough sleep has been linked in developing diabetes, heart disease, obesity,lower immunity levels and depression. Adults need about seven to eight hours of sleep per night. Let's make the necessary changes to ensure an adequate amount of sleep. on a regular basis.

  • GNC Zinc Magnesium Amino Complex contains hops flower extract, L-Theanine, L-Tryptophan,Vitamin B6, Zinc and Magnesium as the major ingredients.
  • Magnesium is necessary for nerver function and zinc has an calming and anti-depressant effect.
  • Hops Flower Extract is an age-old traditional remedy to help with the sleep problems.
  • L-Tryptophan,L-Theanine & Vitamin B-6 are considered to be sleep supporting amino acid.

 

Benefits

  • Relaxes the Nerves.

Promotes Good Sleep

name: GNC Fish Body Oil
description:
GNC Fish Body Oil

Product Description

  • Growing research on benefits of omega-3 fatty acids has led to the development of fish oil supplements.
  • It is difficult to get the recommended dose of EPA+DHA (forms of omega-3 fatty acids) from the natural sources.
  • Hence, a supplement forms the bridge between the requirement and deficiencies.
  • ICMR recommends to have minimum 250 to 2g of EPA+DHA daily.
  • Each serving of GNC fish body oil will provide 1000mg of Omega-3 Fatty acids, with 300mg comes from EPA and DHA.

 

Benefits

  • DHA is known to support your normal brain and eye health.
  • EPA, on the other hand can protect your heart, skin and joint from inflammatory response.
  • Thus, overall this supplement can support your eye, heart, brain,skin and joint health.

name: GNC Trifle Fast Acting
description:
GNC Triflex™ Fast Acting

Product Description

GNCTriflex Fast Acting is the product prepared using two special joint supporting ingredients which are Chondroitin and Glucosamine. GNC Triflex is Ideal for those who have active lifestyles, who are sports enthusiasts, overweight and suffer from joint problems and patients who suffer from osteoarthritis, gout and rheumatoid arthritis. Each serving of Triflex Fast Acting will provide

  • 1500 mg of Glucosamine and 1200 mg of Chondroitin.
  • 100 mg of Turmeric Root Extract
  • 250 mg of Après flex Boswellia Serrata Gum Extract

Benefits of GNC Triflex for Joint SupportGlucosamine and Chondroitin are natural building blocks found in connective tissues and joint cartilage. Scientific research has shown that these building block compounds help to support the body's natural ability to regenerate cartilage and lubricate joints thus supporting joint health integrity and function. GNC Triflex with these ingredients provide benefits like:

  • Helps Improve joint comfort & stiffness
  • Supports the body's natural ability to regenerate cartilage and lubricate joints
  • Addition of ApresFlex®, provides faster relief of painful joints

name: GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil softgel 60 cap
description:
GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil

Key Features

  • GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil is a rich source of Omega 3 fatty acids and helps to provide 1500 mg of Omega 3 fatty acids with 900 mg of EPA+DHA per serving
  • These high quality softgels can also provide support to joint and skin health
  • GNC Fish Oil Softgels can also assist in maintaining normal blood pressure and support healthy cholesterol levels
  • Enteric coated fish oil supplement from GNC also assists in the prevention of fishy burps

 

Product Description

 

GNC Fish Oil is a dietary supplement, which comes loaded with the benefits of omega 3 fatty acids. Consuming these softgels on a regular basis can help you reap the benefits of Omega 3 fatty acids, which includes EPA and DHA as the active ingredients. GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil delivers 1500 mg of total Omega 3 fatty acids with 900 mg of EPA / DHA (540 mg EPA and 360 mg DHA) per serving.

As per Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR), it is important to consume minimum of 250 to 2g of EPA and DHA daily to gain the health benefits. (ICMR, 2010). Each serving of GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil will provide 1500 mg of total Omega-3 Fatty Acids with 900 mg of EPA/DHA (540 mg EPA and 360 mg DHA per serving).

Regular intake of Omega-3 fatty acid is highly recommended and beneficial right from the first day of your life i.e. during pregnancy, kids, teens, and older age. It is essential fatty acids which if taken on a regular basis can prevent serious health problems and complications! EPA and DHA, being the active ingredient of omega-3 fatty acids plays a different role at different life stages.
